alert.note: Alert for Manua; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 03 at 6:55PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A Wind Advisory is in effect... * A strong trough will bring breezy winds over American Samoa. The strongest winds are expected to be near the harbor region and the northern side of the islands. * TIMING...through Monday * IMPACTS...Downed shallow-root trees and phone lines are possible. Shifting of loose and unsecured objects are also possible. FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 654 AFIAFI ASO SA APERILA 3 2022 ...FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI... * TAIMI...E oo atu i le Aso Gafua * NOFOAGA AAFIA...Savili malolosi e mafai ona faafaigata ai ona faafoe ai taavale, ae maise lava taavale maualuluga. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O fautuaga mo savili malolosi o lona uiga o savili e oo atu i le 25 i le 35 mph ma e agi faata`uta`u o le a aafia ai le atunuu. O nei savili malolosi o le a faafaigata ai ona faafoe taavale i luga o le auala tele, ae maise lava taavale tetele ma le maualuluga. Faamolemole ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: A wind advisory means that winds of up to 25 to 35 MPH are expected. Winds This strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
